ClassDef.Name: Sound

Properties.Name: Audio
Properties.Description: The audio asset to be played by the sound.

Properties.Name: Volume
Properties.Description: The volume level of the sound.

Properties.Name: Pitch
Properties.Description: The pitch level of the sound.

Properties.Name: Autoplay
Properties.Description: Determines whether the sound should start playing automatically when loaded.

Properties.Name: Loop
Properties.Description: Determines whether the sound should loop when it reaches the end.

Properties.Name: PlayInWorld
Properties.Description: Determines whether the sound should be played in the 3D world space.

Properties.Name: MaxDistance
Properties.Description: The maximum distance at which the sound can be heard.

Properties.Name: Time
Properties.Description: Indicates the current playback position of the sound in seconds.

Properties.Name: Playing
Properties.Description: Indicates whether the sound is currently playing.

Properties.Name: Loading
Properties.Description: Indicates whether the sound is currently loading.

Properties.Name: Length
Properties.Description: The total length of the sound in seconds.

Methods.Name: PlayOneShot
Methods.Description: Plays the sound once at the specified volume without affecting the current playback.

Methods.Name: Stop
Methods.Description: Stops the sound if it is currently playing.

Events.Name: Loaded
Events.Description: Fires when this sound has loaded

ClassDef.Description: Sounds are objects that can be placed in the world and play audio.
